message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand that $120 is a bit steep, but I'm still willing to work with you. I can do $110, which is the lowest I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $95. I think that's a fair price for the product.
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $95, but I can do $105. That's as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. If you're willing to meet me at $105, I'll make it happen.
